entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
